channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He lives paycheck to paycheck’: My husband pays his bills late and sits at home playing on his computer. How do I fix it?
item.description: “He seems to think ‘bill due’ dates are a suggestion. He has literally no savings.”

item.title: ‘I’m in a financial mess’: My income was cut in half. Do I sell my $600K home and kiss my 2.9% mortgage rate goodbye?
item.description: “We can move 10 miles south, where property is much cheaper.”

item.title: My siblings don’t earn nearly as much as me. Should my parents leave me less money in their will?
item.description: “I’m concerned that my parents are going to strike me from any will.”

item.title: I’m 83 and will have $500K if I sell my house. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I can just barely handle my expenses with a mortgage payment of $984 and an income of $3,800.”

item.title: I’m 53, a single parent with a $1 million home. My boyfriend wants to marry. Am I better off staying single?
item.description: “Should I just maintain the status quo or marry the love of my life?”

item.title: Warren Buffett's cash fortress Berkshire closes gap with S&P 500 as AI worries depress Wall Street
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway's B shares and A shares moved 4.5% higher this week after a strong earnings report last weekend.

item.title: Bank of America says Domino’s Pizza is among the most likely M&A candidates
item.description: U.S. M&A deals are tracking for the best year for dealmaking activity since 2021, Bank of America said.

item.title: Carl Icahn returns to a familiar sector — auto repair — as he builds a 15% stake in Monro
item.description: Icahn has a long history in the automotive parts and services industry, so this investment could play out in several different ways.

item.title: Buy the weakness in stocks like Tesla and Palantir as bull market has more room to run, investor says

item.title: Bank of America picks five stocks with more room to run after earnings
item.description: Bank of America named five stocks the firm says are well positioned following earnings including this top tech name.
